item.title: [Dementhium 639] Level 99 Congratulations Server Message [Dementhium 639]
item.dc:creator: @RSMASTER RSMASTER
item.description:
@RSMASTER wrote:

This will broadcast: “[username] has just achieved level 99 in [skillname].” To all players in game.

Go to org\dementhium\content\interfaces\LevelUp.java

Find: player.getSettings().getLeveledUp()[i] = false;

Under that add:[code] if (player.getSkills().getLevelForExperience(i) == 99) {

    			for (Player pl : World.getWorld().getPlayers()) {
    				pl.sendMessage("<col=008000>" + Misc.formatPlayerNameForDisplay(player.getUsername()) + " has just achieved level 99 in " + Skills.SKILL_NAME[i] + ".</col>");
    			}
            	
            }[/code]

Compile and your done.

Read full topic
